text: Dikala diya udione dyandaga uuko, mna ivi haluse hadihali naho ivi haluse dyaunga dihagihi kulawa kwo mnyongomela howiina uheelo no kuita ko ubanangi, wadya nawo wakwikala mwe isi wata mazina hayewandikwe mwe kitabu cho ugima kukongela aho isi yandaga ikei kuumbigwa, nawehelwe wakeza kudiona diya idikala kwaviya dyandaga uuko naho ivi haluse hadihali mna nedize naho.
